title: The Unseen Guardian: The Tale of Ivan Scott
summary: Ivan Scott, a retired writer and public speaker, discovers his unexpected ability to become invisible, which he uses over the course of a week to protect his community from unseen dangers.
summaryGerman: Ivan Scott, ein pensionierter Schriftsteller und Redner, entdeckt seine unerwartete Fähigkeit, unsichtbar zu werden, die er im Laufe einer Woche nutzt, um seine Gemeinde vor unsichtbaren Gefahren zu schützen.
summaryDutch: Ivan Scott, een gepensioneerde schrijver en spreker, ontdekt zijn onverwachte vermogen om onzichtbaar te worden, wat hij gedurende een week gebruikt om zijn gemeenschap te beschermen tegen ongeziene gevaren.
summaryFrench: Ivan Scott, écrivain et orateur à la retraite, découvre sa capacité inattendue à devenir invisible, qu'il utilise au cours d'une semaine pour protéger sa communauté contre les dangers invisibles.

story.text: Ivan Scott woke up feeling unusually energetic. During his morning walk, he vanished right as a car sped towards him, avoiding what would have been a disastrous accident.

More comfortable with his newfound skill, Ivan used his invisibility to stop a burglary in his neighborhood. Spying the burglars, he scared them away by moving objects around, making them believe the house was haunted.
Ivan addressed the local community at the library about safety and vigilance. His passionate speech, unseen but powerfully heard, inspired many to take action.
Feeling romantic, Ivan visited his old writing spots around the city, reminiscing about his past and invisibly interacting with admirers of his books, leaving signed copies on their tables.
Thrilled by his heroics, Ivan felt epic and spent the day helping his neighbors with chores while invisible, enjoying their confusion and surprise as tasks seemed to complete themselves.
His actions throughout the week not going unnoticed, Ivan attended a community meeting as an unseen observer, realizing the positive impact he had fostered in his community.
Reflecting on a week of secret heroism, Ivan wrote a memoir piece, documenting his thoughts and experiences, content with his double life.

ending: In the quiet of his study, Ivan smiled, content that even in the twilight years, one can still be a hero in their own right.
moral: No matter your age, you have the power to make a positive impact in the world.
